original_text: Let him know, that he which converteth the sinner from the error of his way shall save a soul from death, and shall hide a multitude of sins.
korean_text: 너희가 알 것은 죄인을 미혹된 길에서 돌아서게 하는 자가 그의 영혼을 사망에서 구원할 것이며 허다한 죄를 덮을 것임이라

sentences.original_text: that he which converteth the sinner
from the error of his way
shall save a soul from death,
and shall hide a multitude of sins.
